content:
Each week I want to give you my 3 stand-out hot green picks of the week. Here are my first 3 must reads for this week:
1) 
 - Gotta love Ooffoo's winning Laureate article for 2010. And I used to work there so I know the team and they are lovely!
2) 
 - who doesn't Treehugger? Well, I love 'em and always find something worth reading there.
3) 
 - I work for this magazine and we recently published a green issue. This was my #1 pick and the most read article online. A real winner.
title: My green picks of the week
author: Al_Tepper
